# Elizabeth King (author)

-->

Elizabeth King (1843 â€“ 22 July 1917), was a British diarist who accompanied her husband, Robert Moss King, to India, where she wrote ''The Diary of a Civilian's Wife in India 1877-1882'', published in 1884. She died at home in Ashcott on 22 July 1917.
